text: Yara allahara rastaya sbiya dhana-sampada byaya kare allahara santusti arjanera laksye ebam nijera manake sudrrha karara jan'ye tadera udaharana tilaya abasthita baganera mata, yate prabala brstipata haya; atahpara dbiguna phasala dana kare. Yadi emana prabala brstipata na'o haya, tabe halka barsana'i yathesta. Allaha tomadera kajakarma yathartha'i pratyaksa karena.
